name: Renego
tag_list: meta-search-engine, job-search, flight-search, property-search, hotel-search, homes, hotels, jobs, flights
overview:
Renego is a German global meta-search engine which covers the fields of job search, property & real estate and flight comparison. The service of Renego is completely free and independent.

Job search The Renego-Job search ( http://jobs.renego.de ) collects job ads from over 150 sources in Germany, this includes job board websites, firm websites and HR agencies. The job search is also international in more than 28 countries worldwide. The service of Renego is 100% free, whatever you need, if you are searching for a job or want to index your job ads in our job search engine. For the Renego-Search we have created our own search algorithm, which sorts all search results by quality criteria as well as most recent ones.

Flight search The Renego flight search ( http://flug.renego.de ) helps thousands of people find the cheapest flights every day. We provide instant comparison on flight prices for over 100 flight search websites with over 750 airlines worldwide. Once you have found and selected your desired airline ticket offer, we will immediately direct you to the supplier to book your flight. The Renego flight search is not an online travel agency, not a booking-portal nor an airline. We are a search engine for flight search comparison. We provide simultaneously comparison on flight prices and show you where you can book the cheapest flight ticket. Our Renego flight search is completely free. You book direct with the airline or travel agent, so you get the lowest price with no added commission!

Hotel search With the Renego hotel search ( http://hotels.renego.de ) you can find hotels and compare the prices for them in over 220 countries worldwide. At the same time we compare over 100 booking-portals and their prices with over 500 000 hotels worldwide. Once you have found and selected your desired hotel, we will immediately direct you to the supplier to book your accommodation. Our service is for seekers as well as for the hotels / accommodation company and it is free. Our Renego hotel search is completely free, so you get the lowest price with no added commission!

Property search The Renego property search ( http://immobilien.renego.de ) offer you Germany-wide flats, houses, commercial properties and flat shares from great number of sources, for rent or purchase. For this Renego searches on over 20 property websites. Our service is for seekers as well as for real estate / property agencies and it is free. To deliver highest quality, the Renego search index is updated daily. Every day we receive several thousands of new property ads.
